item.title: Comment on The Sea Change on Crypto-Regulation by Adam
item.description:
Does Alex use Brave browser? It has a crypto wallet and blocks ads (including those pesky YouTube ads). It's the goat.

item.title: Comment on The Sea Change on Crypto-Regulation by Liface
item.description:
Reply to Adam:

Does Alex use Brave browser? It has a crypto wallet and blocks ads (including those pesky YouTube ads). It's the goat.

What makes it the GOAT? Because my trusty Firefox also blocks ads with Ublock and has a crypto wallet with Metamask.
